title: A1 - ENV + HTML
description: This assignment covers environment setup and basic HTML structure. Submit a link to your Web application running on Netlify. The landing page should include your full name, section, links to each lab, and the Kanbas application.

title: A2 - CSS + BOOTSTRAP
description: This assignment focuses on styling your Web pages using CSS and Bootstrap. Ensure responsive design and submit the updated project link.

title: A3 - JAVASCRIPT + REACT
description: This assignment introduces JavaScript and React for building interactive Web applications. You are required to submit the deployed version of your React application.
